snippet: Pitcher C. C. Sabathia became the latest professional athlete to join Roc Nation Sports, the agency that represents Robinson Cano, Sabathia’s former teammate on the Yankees.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher C C Sabathia becomes the latest professional athlete to join Roc Nation Sports, agency that represents Robinson Cano, Sabathia’s former teammate on the Yankees; other baseball items noted.
lead_paragraph: Pitcher C. C. Sabathia became the latest professional athlete to join Roc Nation Sports, the agency that represents Robinson Cano, Sabathia’s former teammate on the Yankees.

headline.main: Sabathia and Cano Reunite, via Jay Z
headline.print_headline: Sabathia and Cano Reunite, via Jay Z
